citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:20PM on
17-May-17.
Arrived at 3:20PM, rang the doorbell & knocked, there was no answer at the facility. Left message on voicemail and
waited until 3:50PM with no response from licensee.
